text: hi I'm Phil from BBC learning english
today I'm gonna tell you how to use make
and do now they can be tricky and there
are some exceptions but here are four
things to remember we use make when we
we'll use do to talk about an activity
what are you doing I'll do some work we
can use make to talk about something
that causes a reaction this music really
makes me want to sing we can also use do
with general activities what are you
doing tomorrow I'm not doing anything
